function.name: OpenWeatherMap.get_current_weather
function.description: Fetches the current weather information for a specified location using the OpenWeatherMap API.

location.description: The location for which current weather information is requested, specified in the format of 'City, Country' in English. For example: 'Seoul, South Korea'.

units.description: The unit system used for the weather data. Can be 'metric' for Celsius, 'imperial' for Fahrenheit, or 'standard' for Kelvin.

api_key.description: The API key used to authenticate requests to the OpenWeatherMap API. This key should be kept secret.

function.name: ControlAppliance.execute
function.description: This function is designed for controlling a home appliance, checking its current status and settings, as well as monitoring indoor air properties like air quality and temperature. For control commands, the input must clearly specify 'power on' or 'start'. To check the status, the input must include the keyword '확인'. Note that this tool is not intended for describing, creating, deleting, or removing modes or routines.

command.description: The command must be specified as a string in Korean, consisting of the room name, appliance name (or alias), and operation command, separated by commas. Examples: '거실, 에어컨, 실행' for turning on the air conditioner in the living room, ', 에어컨, 냉방 실행' for activating cooling without specifying the room, '다용도실, 통돌이, 중지' for stopping the washing machine (alias '통돌이') in the utility room.

function.name: HNA_WQA.search
function.description: Retrieve up-to-date information by searching the web using keywords. This is particularly useful for queries regarding topics that change frequently, such as the current president, recent movies, or popular songs.

keyword.description: The search term used by the HNA WQA to find relevant information on the web.

result_format.description: The desired format of the search results.

language.description: The language preference for the search results.

max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to return.

function.name: HNA_NEWS.search
function.description: Searches for recent events and news based on the specified keyword.

keyword.description: The key term used to search for relevant news articles.

category.description: The category to filter news articles by.

date_range.description: The date range for the news search, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD'.

sort_by.description: The sorting order of the search results.

language.description: The language of the news articles to retrieve.

function.name: cookbook.search_recipe
function.description: Searches for cooking recipes based on a provided keyword. Returns a list of recipes that contain the keyword in their title or ingredients list.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in the recipe titles or ingredients.

cuisine.description: The cuisine type to narrow down the search results.

max_results.description: The maximum number of recipe results to return.

function.name: search_products
function.description: Search for products based on various criteria such as color, size, category, price range, and brand, to find specific Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) or general Stock Production Units (SPUs).

color.description: The color of the product. This is an optional parameter that can be used to refine SKU searches.

size.description: The size of the product. This is an optional parameter that can be used to refine SKU searches.

category.description: The category of the product, such as 'electronics', 'clothing', or 'furniture'. This parameter is required for both SPU and SKU level searches.

price_min.description: The minimum price of the product search. Enter a float value representing the lowest price in dollars.

price_max.description: The maximum price of the product search. Enter a float value representing the highest price in dollars.

brand.description: The brand of the product. This is an optional parameter for searching within a specific brand.

function.name: get_product_details
function.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product, including options for size, color, material, and care instructions.

item_id.description: The unique identifier of the product, required to fetch specific product details.

color.description: The color of the product. Specify this parameter to filter product details by color.

size.description: The size of the product. Specify this parameter to filter product details by size.

detailLevel.description: The level of detail required for the product information. Use 'SKU' for size and color details.

material.description: The material of the product. This parameter is optional and can be used to filter product details.

care_instructions.description: Whether to include care instructions in the product details. If true, care instructions will be included.

function.name: get_pods
function.description: Retrieves a list of all pods within a specified namespace in a Kubernetes cluster.

namespace.description: The namespace from which to retrieve pods. For example, 'default' or 'kube-system'.

label_selector.description: A selector to restrict the list of returned objects by their labels. Defaults to everything if not specified.

field_selector.description: A selector to restrict the list of returned objects by their fields. Defaults to everything if not specified.

include_uninitialized.description: If true, partially initialized resources are included in the response.

namespace.description: The namespace identifier from which services are to be fetched.

function.name: get_movies
function.description: Retrieves a list of movies playing in a specified city and cinema hall, with options to filter by date, language, and format.

city.description: The name of the city where movies are being searched, such as 'Noida', 'Amritsar', or 'Indore'.

cinema_hall.description: The name of the cinema hall, for example 'PVR Logix', 'SARV Cinemas', or 'Miraj Cinemas'.

movie_date.description: The date for which to retrieve movie listings, in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'. Defaults to today's date in India.

movie_language.description: The language of the movies to filter by, such as 'Hindi', 'English', 'Malayalam', 'Telugu', or 'Punjabi'.

movie_format.description: The format of the movies to filter by, with options like '2D', '3D', '4DX', '2D Screen X', 'ICE', 'IMAX 2D'.

function.name: get_show_times
function.description: Retrieves available show times for a specified movie in a given city on a particular date.

city.description: The city where the show times are to be retrieved, such as 'Noida', 'Amritsar', or 'Indore'.

movie_name.description: The exact name of the movie for which show times are needed, for example 'Fighter' or 'Crakk'.

movie_date.description: The date for which to retrieve show times, in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'.

cinema_hall.description: The specific cinema hall to check for show times, if any. For example, 'PVR Logix' or 'Miraj Cinemas'.

movie_language.description: The language of the movie. Options include 'Hindi', 'English', 'Punjabi', etc.

movie_format.description: The format in which the movie is available, such as '2D', '3D', or 'IMAX 2D'.

function.name: get_movie_details
function.description: Retrieve the detailed information of a specified movie. The function returns data such as the title, release year, genre, and director of the movie.

movie_name.description: The exact title of the movie for which details are being requested, such as 'The Shawshank Redemption' or 'Inception'.

include_reviews.description: Specifies whether to include user reviews in the movie details.

language.description: The language in which to retrieve the movie details. Default is English (EN).

function.name: get_current_weather

location.description: The location for which to get the weather, in the format of 'City, State', such as 'San Francisco, CA' or 'New York, NY'.

unit.description: The unit of temperature for the weather report.

function.name: add_mtnards_server
function.description: Creates a new configuration for a MTNA Rich Data Services (RDS) server or adds it to an existing list of configurations.

name.description: The unique server name or nickname to identify the MTNA RDS server configuration. Optional and can be used for easier reference.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the MTNA RDS server. If not specified, 'localhost' is used.

api_key.description: The API key required to authenticate with the MTNA RDS server.

function.name: add_postgres_server
function.description: This function adds or creates a new Postgres server configuration by accepting necessary details such as server nickname, host, port, database, username, and password.

nickname.description: A unique name or nickname to identify the Postgres server.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the Postgres server, such as '127.0.0.1' for localhost.

port.description: The port number on which the Postgres server is running. The standard port for Postgres is 5432.

database.description: The name of the default database to connect to. The default Postgres database is typically named 'postgres'.

username.description: The username for authentication with the Postgres server. An example username could be 'admin'.

password.description: The password for authentication with the Postgres server. It is recommended to use a strong password.

function.name: dartfx_help
function.description: Provides assistance on a specific topic within the DartFX application. Returns detailed information and guidance for the user.

topic.description: The topic for which help is requested. This should be a keyword or phrase related to a feature or module within the DartFX application.

language.description: The language in which the help content should be provided. Defaults to English if not specified.

function.name: default_function
function.description: This function performs a default operation with optional customization parameters.

option_flag.description: A flag that indicates whether the default operation should be customized.

precision.description: Specifies the numeric precision for the operation's output.

operation_mode.description: Determines the mode of operation to be used.

function.name: add_mtnards_server
function.description: Adds a new MTN Advanced Rich Data Services (RDS) server configuration to the system.

nickname.description: An easily recognizable name or alias for the server.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the server, such as '192.168.0.1' or 'server.domain.com'.

api_key.description: The unique API key required to authenticate against the server.

function.name: add_postgres_server
function.description: Adds a new PostgreSQL server configuration to the environment, allowing connections to be established with the specified credentials.

nickname.description: A unique nickname or alias for the PostgreSQL server instance, for easier identification.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of the PostgreSQL server.

port.description: The port number on which the PostgreSQL server is running. The default PostgreSQL port is 5432.

database.description: The name of the default database to connect to on the PostgreSQL server.

username.description: The username for authentication with the PostgreSQL server.

password.description: The password for authentication with the PostgreSQL server. Ensure to use a strong and secure password.

function.name: connect_to_server
function.description: Establishes a connection to the specified server or checks the status of an existing connection.

nickname.description: A unique identifier or alias for the server to connect to.

timeout.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for the connection to be established before timing out.

retry_attempts.description: The number of attempts to connect to the server in case of failure.

use_ssl.description: Determines whether to use SSL encryption for the connection.

function.name: list_servers
function.description: Retrieves a list of all the servers currently deployed within the specified environment, optionally filtered by server type.

type.description: Specifies the type of server to filter the list. If not provided, servers of all types are included.

function.name: list_files
function.description: List all the files within the current project directory. Optionally, list files of a specific type only.

file_type.description: The specific file type to list, such as 'txt' for text files or 'md' for markdown files. Provide the extension without the dot.

include_hidden.description: Whether to include hidden files (those starting with a dot) in the listing.

recursive.description: Whether to recursively list files in all subdirectories.

function.name: open_project
function.description: This function either creates a new Data Artifex project or opens an existing one within the specified directory.

path.description: The file system path to the directory where the project is to be created or opened. The path should be absolute or relative to the current working directory.

create_if_missing.description: Determines whether to create a new project if no existing project is found at the specified path.

access_mode.description: The mode in which the project should be opened, either read-only or read-write.

function.name: close_project
function.description: Closes the currently active project in the Data Artifex system, ensuring all resources are properly released and data is saved.

project_id.description: Unique identifier of the project to be closed.

save_changes.description: Specifies whether to save any unsaved changes before closing the project.

backup.description: Determines if a backup should be created before closing the project.

function.name: dartfx_help
function.description: Provides guidance and assistance to the user on a particular topic within the DartFX application.

topic.description: The specific topic the user needs help with, such as 'account_setup', 'trading_interface', or 'funds_transfer'.

section.description: The section of the topic where the user requires more information. Optional, and if not provided, the entire topic guide is presented.

format.description: The format in which the help guidance should be provided. Options include 'text', 'video', or 'interactive'.

file_type.description: The specific file type to list, such as 'txt' for text files or 'md' for markdown files. Provide the extension without the dot.

include_hidden.description: Whether to include hidden files (those starting with a dot) in the listing.

recursive.description: Whether to recursively list files in all subdirectories.

function.name: open_project
function.description: This function either creates a new Data Artifex project or opens an existing one within the specified directory.

path.description: The file system path to the directory where the project is to be created or opened. The path should be absolute or relative to the current working directory.

create_if_missing.description: Determines whether to create a new project if no existing project is found at the specified path.

access_mode.description: The mode in which the project should be opened, either read-only or read-write.

function.name: close_project
function.description: Closes the currently active project in the Data Artifex system, ensuring all resources are properly released and data is saved.

project_id.description: Unique identifier of the project to be closed.

save_changes.description: Specifies whether to save any unsaved changes before closing the project.

backup.description: Determines if a backup should be created before closing the project.

function.name: dartfx_help
function.description: Provides guidance and assistance to the user on a particular topic within the DartFX application.

topic.description: The specific topic the user needs help with, such as 'account_setup', 'trading_interface', or 'funds_transfer'.

section.description: The section of the topic where the user requires more information. Optional, and if not provided, the entire topic guide is presented.

format.description: The format in which the help guidance should be provided. Options include 'text', 'video', or 'interactive'.

function.name: Travel_1_FindAttractions
function.description: Browse attractions in a given city, filtering by entry fee, category, and suitability for children.

location.description: The city or town where the attractions are located, in the format of 'City, State' or 'City, Country'. For example, 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Paris, France'.

free_entry.description: Indicates whether the attraction has free entry. 'True' for free entry, 'False' for paid entry, 'dontcare' for no preference.

category.description: The category of the attraction. Options include religious sites, recreational parks, historical landmarks, etc. 'dontcare' indicates no specific category preference.

good_for_kids.description: Indicates whether the attraction is suitable for children. 'True' means suitable, 'False' means not suitable, 'dontcare' indicates no preference.
